definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
DMV (department of motor vehicles) (abbr. for 公安局交通管理局車輛管理所|公安局交通管理局车辆管理所)

sentences.english: The traffic control department for the convenience of the masses, and also introduced a number of user-friendly facilities.
sentences.chinese: 交管部門爲了方便羣衆，也引入了很多人性化的設施。

sentences.english: Instead, the pilot told the controller that they would ditch the plane in the river.
sentences.chinese: 然而飛行員告訴交管員他們要在河上降落。

definition: traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
group/a large body of/production brigade/military group
police classification/subdivision of policing activities (traffic, border guard, criminal etc)
to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
to search for and seize (criminals, smuggled goods etc)
